directions: Combine brown sugar, jalapeno pepper, soy sauce, lime juice, honey, rice vinegar, red wine vinegar, sesame oil, fish sauce, and red pepper flakes in a saucepan; bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until slightly reduced, 15 to 20 minutes.
ingredients: 1 pinch red pepper flakes, or more to taste
title: Sandy's Sweet Heat Asian Wing Sauce
